mapper.select:
WITH SMW_CODE1 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW001'), SMW_CODE3 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW003'), SMW_CODE5 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW004'), SMW_CODE6 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW002'), SMW_CODE9 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW012') SELECT
c1.cd_nm AS os,
c9.cd_nm AS membership,
c3.cd_nm AS sex,
c5.cd_nm AS ageRange,
c6.cd_nm AS telecom,
TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(t.STRD_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')||'('||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(t.STRD_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'dy')|| ')' AS standardDate,
SUM ( t.DAY_ISSUE_CNT ) AS totIssueCnt, SUM ( t.DAY_ISSUE_USER_CNT ) AS totIssueUserCnt, SUM ( t.TOT_ISSUE_CNT ) AS dayIssueCnt, SUM ( t.TOT_ISSUE_USER_CNT ) AS dayIssueUserCnt FROM SMW_D_CARD_ISSUE t, SMW_CODE1 c1, SMW_CODE3 c3, SMW_CODE5 c5, SMW_CODE6 c6, SMW_CODE9 c9 WHERE t.strd_dt BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND (t.mem_card_cl_cd <> 'TT') AND t.os_cd = c1.com_cd AND t.gndr_cd = c3.com_cd AND t.age_rng_cd = c5.com_cd AND t.telc_cd = c6.com_cd AND t.mem_card_cl_cd = c9.com_cd
c1.cd_nm,
c9.cd_nm,
c3.cd_nm,
c5.cd_nm,
c6.cd_nm,
t.strd_dt,

WITH SMW_CODE1 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW001'), SMW_CODE3 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW003'), SMW_CODE5 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW004'), SMW_CODE6 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW002'), SMW_CODE9 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW012'), dateS AS ( SELECT strd_year||LPAD(strd_wk_seq,2,'0') dateStr FROM smw_cldr_wk WHERE #{startDate} BETWEEN wk_st_dt AND wk_ed_dt), dateE AS ( SELECT strd_year||LPAD(strd_wk_seq,2,'0') dateStr FROM smw_cldr_wk WHERE #{endDate} BETWEEN wk_st_dt AND wk_ed_dt) SELECT
c1.cd_nm AS os,
c9.cd_nm AS membership,
c3.cd_nm AS sex,
c5.cd_nm AS ageRange,
c6.cd_nm AS telecom,
t.strd_yr||'('||LPAD(t.strd_wk,2,'0')||')' AS standardDate,
SUM ( t.DAY_ISSUE_CNT ) AS totIssueCnt, SUM ( t.DAY_ISSUE_USER_CNT ) AS totIssueUserCnt, SUM ( t.TOT_ISSUE_CNT ) AS dayIssueCnt, SUM ( t.TOT_ISSUE_USER_CNT ) AS dayIssueUserCnt FROM SMW_W_CARD_ISSUE t, SMW_CODE1 c1, SMW_CODE3 c3, SMW_CODE5 c5, SMW_CODE6 c6, dateS, dateE, SMW_CODE9 c9 WHERE (t.strd_yr||LPAD(t.strd_wk,2,'0')) BETWEEN dateS.dateStr AND dateE.dateStr AND (t.mem_card_cl_cd <> 'TT') AND t.os_cd = c1.com_cd AND t.gndr_cd = c3.com_cd AND t.age_rng_cd = c5.com_cd AND t.telc_cd = c6.com_cd AND t.mem_card_cl_cd = c9.com_cd
c1.cd_nm,
c9.cd_nm,
c3.cd_nm,
c5.cd_nm,
c6.cd_nm,
t.strd_yr||'('||LPAD(t.strd_wk,2,'0')||')',

WITH SMW_CODE1 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW001'), SMW_CODE3 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW003'), SMW_CODE5 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW004'), SMW_CODE6 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW002'), SMW_CODE9 AS ( SELECT com_cd, (sort_seq||'@@'||cd_nm) cd_nm FROM smw_code WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND lcl_cd = 'SMW012') SELECT
c1.cd_nm AS os,
c9.cd_nm AS membership,
c3.cd_nm AS sex,
c5.cd_nm AS ageRange,
c6.cd_nm AS telecom,
TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (t.strd_ym, 'YYYYMM'), 'YYYY-MM') AS standardDate,
SUM ( t.DAY_ISSUE_CNT ) AS totIssueCnt, SUM ( t.DAY_ISSUE_USER_CNT ) AS totIssueUserCnt, SUM ( t.TOT_ISSUE_CNT ) AS dayIssueCnt, SUM ( t.TOT_ISSUE_USER_CNT ) AS dayIssueUserCnt FROM SMW_M_CARD_ISSUE t, SMW_CODE1 c1, SMW_CODE3 c3, SMW_CODE5 c5, SMW_CODE6 c6, SMW_CODE9 c9 WHERE t.strd_ym BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND (t.mem_card_cl_cd <> 'TT') AND t.os_cd = c1.com_cd AND t.gndr_cd = c3.com_cd AND t.age_rng_cd = c5.com_cd AND t.telc_cd = c6.com_cd AND t.mem_card_cl_cd = c9.com_cd
c1.cd_nm,
c9.cd_nm,
c3.cd_nm,
c5.cd_nm,
c6.cd_nm,
t.strd_ym,
